CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1946, pg. 25, reads: "And Down He Goes - Bacon Smith, West Virginia backfield ace, didn't get far on this play. In fact, he lost six yards when Johnson C. Smith's Joe Williams (30) hauled him down in game which West Virginia won, 6 to 0, last Saturday at Institute, W. Va. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: College football game with Johnson C. Smith versus West Virginia State, with player being tackled in center, West Virginia
